vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Πάτμος, -ου, ἡ
Patmos, an island in the Ægean Sea: Rev.1:9.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § Patmos, an island in the Aegean sea, Rev. 1:9*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拔摩 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "我的殺戮"
愛琴海中一個崎嶇且寸草不生的海島
#啟 1:9|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拔摩 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "我的杀戮"
爱琴海中一个崎岖且寸草不生的海岛
#启 1:9|
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Bát-mô; Pát-mô là một khu tự quản ở vùng Nam Egeo, Hy Lạp.
